post.author: Admin
post.title: Get Ready For States!
post.description: Dear Band Families, What an exciting weekend our concert bands had the first week of March. The conc
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

What an exciting weekend our concert bands had the first week of March. The concert bands had a SWEEP of  SUPERIOR ratings allowing all FOUR of our concert bands to attend the State Contest!

NRHS is the HOST for State Contest on April 20-21st. Therefore, we will need MANY volunteers to ensure the weekend flows smoothly. 

Though we will not know the performance schedule until we are closer to contest date, please consider signing up NOW for your volunteer position (please sign up for more than 1!). You WILL be able to see your concert band member perform. Signing up early ensures that you will be able to help out in the area you enjoy!

Please follow the signupgenius link below to sign up for the State Contest.  If you have any questions about any volunteer positions, please call: Amanda Kost 440-864-6543 or email: memandy@ameritech.net.

http://www.signupgenius.com/go/805054EAFA729A02-omea1

Thank you in advance for your help!

Amanda Kost
